comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

Older user comments:

See the driver's home page (the "cdj670" link from the table below) for documentation and limitations. Various modes and papertypes are supported.

Use the cdj550 driver with 1 bit per pixel for fast black-only printing.

Consumables/Refills: cartridge
